name: Ariados
author: Hajime Kusajima
flavor_text: It attaches silk to its prey and sets it free. Later, it tracks the silk to the prey and its friends.

abilities.name: Poisonous Net
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this Ability. Both Active Pokémon (except for {G} Pokémon) are now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Impound
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn.
